title: How to Make Fruit Cocktail Cake

steps.headline: Spray a 9-inch square pan with nonstick cooking spray.
Sift together dry ingredients and add to a mixing bowl.
Pour batter into prepared baking pan.
Combine chopped nuts and brown sugar in a separate mixing bowl.
Sprinkle nuts and brown sugar mixture over cake batter.
Bake for 40 minutes or until cake tests done.
Serve with whipped cream or Cool Whip, if desired.

text: Preheat oven to 350ºF (180ºC).  Spray a 9-inch square pan with nonstick cooking spray.  Sift together dry ingredients and add to a mixing bowl.  Add fruit cocktail.  Add egg.  Mix well.  Pour batter into prepared baking pan.  Combine chopped nuts and brown sugar in a separate mixing bowl.  Sprinkle nuts and brown sugar mixture over cake batter.  Bake for 40 minutes or until cake tests done.  Serve with whipped cream or Cool Whip, if desired.  Enjoy your fruit cocktail cake.
